About the policy: An exclusive product for persons diagnosed or treated of Cancer
Type of Cover: Section I - Cancer Lump sum payment - If the treatment for the Second Cancer/recurrence/metastasis is taken after 30 months from the inception of the policy. Section II - Surgical treatment* - other than Cancer. Section III - Medical management treatment* - other than Cancer. Accidents are covered.
Co-payment: 10% for indemnity claims (Section II and III) - 60 years and above age at entry
Renewal: It is a “pilot product”, it will run for 5 years, after that if it is withdrawn renewal can be offered in a suitable alternate product.
Lesser Premium: If the Claim is paid under section 1, Policy will get renewed in section 2 & 3 with lesser premium
Pre Acceptance Medical screening: Not required. Underwriting will be based on Previous medical records and latest Reports, Staging & Treatment should have been done at comprehensive cancer care centre.

Sum Insured Options.SI 3 Lac: Section 1 (Cancer Lump-sum benefit): 1,50,000, Section 2 - Surgical management*: 1,00,000, Section 3 - Medical management*: 50,000
Sum Insured Options.5 Lac: Section 1 (Cancer Lump-sum benefit): 2,50,000, Section 2 - Surgical management*: 1,50,000, Section 3 - Medical management*: 1,00,000

Hospitalization - Room Rent: Single standard AC room (Stay in higher class room will result in PROPORTIONATE DEDUCTION)
Ambulance Charges: 1500/- per hospitalization and 2000/- per policy period
Day Care Procedures: All day care procedures are covered (Actuals)
Modern Treatments: Based on the Sum insured chosen limits differ, for full particulars refer policy wording
Co-Pay: 10% for indemnity claims (Section II and III) - 60 years and above age at entry
Major declined risks: Cardiovascular Diseases (CVD),Cancer in advanced stages such as Stage 3/ Stage 4,Chronic Kidney Diseases,Cerebrovascular Diseases (CVA),Parkinson's disease,Alzheimer’s disease,Psycho-somatic disorders, Cirrhosis of liver,COPD,Auto immune diseases/ Connective tissue disorders, Patients on long-term “Anticoagulant therapy”
Claims procedure: If claims under section 1 for cancer is made, the policy will continue until expiry with indemnity cover under section 2 and section 3
